deck.title: Got questions about life?
deck.paragraph:
Eager to explore Christianity further? Then join us for an online Alpha.

Alpha is an opportunity for people to investigate the Christian faith for themselves. Alpha is really for anyone who's curious. Exploring topics such as "Is there more to life than this?" and "Who is Jesus?"

Each week will involve watching a 20-25 minute presentation, followed by an online discussion via video call.

Send us an email at office@gatewaychurch.co.uk to find out more.
